allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Content install.ps1 | Out-Null; if \($?\) { Write-Host ''install.ps1: OK'' } else { Write-Host ''install.ps1: ERROR'' }")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Content install-remote.ps1 | Out-Null; if \($?\) { Write-Host ''install-remote.ps1: OK'' } else { Write-Host ''install-remote.ps1: ERROR'' }")
